item.description: Note: This page will be updated constantly throughout the semester. Date Lesson Slides Readings DataCamp HW Project Week 00 Mon, Jan 20 No class - Martin Luther King, Jr. Day holiday Wed, Jan 22 Introduction to Data Science Week 01 Mon, Jan 27 Meet The Tools Wed, Jan 29 Visualization Part 1 Week 02 Mon, Feb 3 Fundamentals of data & data visualization Wed, Feb 5 Tidy data & data wrangling Week 03 Mon, Feb 10 Merge conflicts Wed, Feb 12 Tips for effective data visualization Week 04 Mon, Feb 17 Wed, Feb 19 Week 05 Mon, Feb 24 Wed, Feb 26 Week 06 Mon, Mar 2 Wed, Mar 4
